mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board4( bnum, matchmethod, skill, manner, mdate, stime, etime, money, matchregion, bid, bname, bcontent, btel, latitude, longitude, mapregion ) VALUES ( board4_bnum_seq.nextval, #{matchmethod}, #{skill}, #{manner}, #{mdate}, #{stime}, #{etime}, #{money}, #{matchregion}, #{bid}, #{bname}, #{bcontent}, #{btel}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{mapregion} )
select board4_bnum_seq.currval from dual
mapper.select: select matchstatus, matchmethod, manner, mdate, stime, etime, matchregion, money, bcontent, skill, bnum, btel,(SELECT count(*) FROM rboard4 t4 WHERE t4.bnum = t1.bnum ) as cnt from board4 t1 order by bnum desc

select bnum, matchstatus, matchmethod, manner, mdate, stime, etime, matchregion, money, bcontent, skill, btel,(SELECT count(*) FROM rboard4 t4 WHERE t4.bnum = t1.bnum ) as cnt from (select row_number() over(order by bnum desc) as num, t1.bnum, t1.matchstatus, t1.matchmethod, t1.manner, t1.mdate, t1.stime, t1.etime, t1.matchregion, t1.money, t1.bcontent, t1.skill, t1.btel from board4 t1, board_category t2 where t1.bcategory = t2.cid
and
mdate like '%'||#{item}||'%'
matchregion like '%'||#{item}||'%'
money like '%'||#{item}||'%'
mdate like '%'||#{item}||'%' or matchregion like '%'||#{item}||'%' or money like '%'||#{item}||'%'
) t1 order by bnum desc

select matchstatus, t2.cid as "boardCategoryVO.cid", t2.cname as "boardCategoryVO.cname", bcategory, matchmethod, manner, mdate, stime, etime, matchregion, money, bcontent, skill, bnum, btel, bid, latitude, longitude, mapregion from board4 t1, board_category t2 where t1.bcategory = t2.cid and t1.bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update board4 set bcategory = #{boardCategoryVO.cid}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, matchstatus = #{matchstatus}, mdate = #{mdate}, matchmethod = #{matchmethod}, matchregion = #{matchregion}, money = #{money}, stime = #{stime}, etime = #{etime}, manner = #{manner}, budate = systimestamp where bnum = #{bnum}
